alert.note: Alert for San Bernardino County-Upper Colorado River Valley (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Lake Wind Advisory issued April 06 at 6:25AM PDT until April 06 at 7:00PM PDT by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...LAKE WIND ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM PDT /7 PM MST/ THIS EVENING... * WHAT...North winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 50 mph. * WHERE...In Nevada, Lake Mead National Recreation Area. In California, San Bernardino County-Upper Colorado River Valley. In Arizona, Lake Mead National Recreation Area and Lake Havasu and Fort Mohave. * WHEN...Until 7 PM PDT /7 PM MST/ this evening. * IMPACTS...Strong winds and rough waves on area lakes will create hazardous conditions for small craft.
info.instruction: Boaters on area lakes should use extra caution since strong winds and rough waves can overturn small craft.

area.areaDesc: San Bernardino County-Upper Colorado River Valley
